title: Research
text:
This is a page about my research projects
Current research projects:
I am a co-founder of LASER at UMN.
We are currently doing research on developing reasoning around algorithmic modelling, conducting code review, and assessing the validity of instruments used in statistics education research. Check out our website for more information!

title: Welcome!
text: I am Chelsey Legacy, an Assistant Teaching Professor at the University of Minnesota. My research interests include statistics and data science education, with a focus on coding and visualization.
